mapper.select: select * from Quality where date=( select MAX(date) as date from Quality) order by name,id DESC

select name,sum(acoffLine)/sum(offLine) as offLine,sum(acdLine)/sum(dLine) as dLine,sum(aclingYu)/sum(lingYu) as lingYu,sum(accareLine)/sum(careLine) as careLine,sum(acroadTest)/sum(roadTest) as roadTest,sum(acoffLine)/sum(offLine)*sum(acdLine)/sum(dLine)*sum(aclingYu)/sum(lingYu)*sum(accareLine)/sum(careLine)*sum(acroadTest)/sum(roadTest) as DR,date from Quality where date=( select MAX(date) as date from Quality) group by date,name

select sum(acoffLine)/sum(offLine) as offLine,sum(acdLine)/sum(dLine) as dLine,sum(aclingYu)/sum(lingYu) as lingYu,sum(accareLine)/sum(careLine) as careLine,sum(acroadTest)/sum(roadTest) as roadTest,sum(acoffLine)/sum(offLine)*sum(acdLine)/sum(dLine)*sum(aclingYu)/sum(lingYu)*sum(accareLine)/sum(careLine)*sum(acroadTest)/sum(roadTest) as DR,date from Quality where date=( select MAX(date) as date from Qualit) group by date
select * from Quality where date>=#{date1} and date <= #{date2} order by name,id DESC

select name,sum(acoffLine)/sum(offLine) as offLine,sum(acdLine)/sum(dLine) as dLine,sum(aclingYu)/sum(lingYu) as lingYu,sum(accareLine)/sum(careLine) as careLine,sum(acroadTest)/sum(roadTest) as roadTest,sum(acoffLine)/sum(offLine)*sum(acdLine)/sum(dLine)*sum(aclingYu)/sum(lingYu)*sum(accareLine)/sum(careLine)*sum(acroadTest)/sum(roadTest) as DR,date from Quality where (date>=#{date1} and date<= #{date2}) group by name

select sum(acoffLine)/sum(offLine) as offLine,sum(acdLine)/sum(dLine) as dLine,sum(aclingYu)/sum(lingYu) as lingYu,sum(accareLine)/sum(careLine) as careLine,sum(acroadTest)/sum(roadTest) as roadTest,sum(acoffLine)/sum(offLine)*sum(acdLine)/sum(dLine)*sum(aclingYu)/sum(lingYu)*sum(accareLine)/sum(careLine)*sum(acroadTest)/sum(roadTest) as DR,date from Quality where (date>=#{date1} and date<= #{date2})
mapper.insert: insert into Quality( name, offLine, dLine, lingYu, careLine, roadTest,date) values (#{name},#{offLine},#{dLine},#{lingYu},#{careLine},#{roadTest},#{date})
